        OutcomeBuilder withBody(CharSequence body,
                        Charset charset)

        Parameters:

        charset - Character encoding to use
        Returns:
        This very OutcomeBuilder instance

      • withBody

        OutcomeBuilder withBody(InputStream body)
        Use an InputStream body if undetermined length. Content-Length header will NOT be set and chunked Transfer-Encoding used.

        Use a chunk size as configured in werval.http.chunksize

        Parameters:
        body - Body InputStream
        Returns:
        This very OutcomeBuilder instance

      • withBody

        OutcomeBuilder withBody(InputStream body,
                        int chunkSize)
        Use an InputStream body of undetermined length.

        Content-Length header will NOT be set and chunked Transfer-Encoding used.

        Parameters:
        body - Body InputStream, closed once consumed
        chunkSize - Desired HTTP chunk size
        Returns:
        This very OutcomeBuilder instance

      • withBody

        OutcomeBuilder withBody(InputStream body,
                        long length)
        Use an InputStream body of known length. Content-Length header will be set and identity Transfer-Encoding used.
        Parameters:
        body - Body InputStream, closed once consumed
        length - Body length
        Returns:
        This very OutcomeBuilder instance

      • build

        Outcome build()
        Returns:
        A new Outcome instance
